document.title: Reporting bugs
document.header: What to do if you find a bug
document.p: If you have any problems, please leave a bug report in the Bug tracker or send an e-mail to the project mailing list.

ul.li: Causalities you observe, for example when the bug manifests by switching to channel 13 on Fridays, but not on other weekdays

When the problem is a program crash, more than the bare fact it is often useful to know where it happens. This information can be obtained with the GNU debugger, just type:
you@yourbox> gdb zapping gdb> run [command line parameters, if any] -- crash -- gdb> bt
(this prints the chain of functions called)
gdb> quit

document.p: I cannot promise a quick fix in all cases, but your effort is greatly appreciated and resolving the problem has top priority.
If this is your first bug report ever, you may want to read How to Report Bugs Effectively by Simon Tatham.
